sentences.sContent: In the background you may see one more dredge.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the background you may see one more dredge.
sentences.sCn: 在背景里，你可以看到另外一辆挖泥机。

synos.tran: （用挖泥船等）[水运]疏浚；（用拖捞网等）捞取；（在食物上）撒（面粉等）

phrases.pCn: 吸泥泵；挖泥泵；排泥泵；泥浆泵

words.tran: 挖泥船；疏浚机；挖泥机；撒粉器

trans.tranOther: a machine, in the form of a bucket ladder, grab, or suction device, used to remove material from a riverbed, channel, etc
